item.description:
Wassail all you fine heathen guys & gals...

So, apologies for the belated reminder, but it seems that Thor has decided to grace area farmer's fields with some much-needed rain this weekend anyway. Folks are still welcome to stop by and hang out in Windsor for a relaxing afternoon (starting a little later than originally planned). I'll still be glad to fire up the grill regardless of the weather.

Do let me know if you plan to attend, so I can e-mail directions. Also so I have a sense of how many to expect and how much food is needed. I've got some random beers, mead, etc... but if you want anything special to drink, BYOB please.

Best!
Mike Hicks
Hartford Asatru Meetup Group

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: Poolmoot! Well sorta...
